mn128:7.4: udakañca pādānaṃ dhovanaṃ → udakañca pādānaṃ (bj, cck, sya1ed, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn128:8.1: kimilo → kimbilo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); kimmilo (cck)
mn128:22.5: patameyya → matameyya (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); tamameyya (cck)
mn128:28.3: divaṃ → divasaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | rattindivaṃ → rattindivanti (bj); rattidivaṃ (mr)
